description: A building within the Punk Hazard research facility used as a gathering point for evacuation. Contains a rail cart system designed for SAD transport.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Converge in Building R-66
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew members, along with Law, G-5 Marines, and rescued children, gather in Building R-66 to prepare their escape from Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the evacuation rally point for all allies on Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: Building is operational and used for evacuation

description: A tanker ship anchored near Punk Hazard used for transporting SAD, the chemical ingredient for producing SMILE artificial Devil Fruits. The ship is surrounded by poisonous gas before Buffalo disperses it.

keyEvents.title: Gas Dispersal Reveals Tanker
keyEvents.description: Buffalo uses his wind generation ability to disperse the poisonous H2S gas, revealing the SAD tanker ship.
keyEvents.significance: Allows Baby 5 and Buffalo to approach and discover Caesar's body.

keyEvents.title: General Franky on Tanker Deck
keyEvents.description: General Franky emerges from the rubble on the SAD tanker ship's deck, surprising Baby 5 and Buffalo.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the confrontation between General Franky and Doflamingo's assassins.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational near Punk Hazard

description: A former government research facility island in the New World, split between fire and ice. The island is covered in toxic gas and serves as Caesar Clown's base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Caesar's Defeat Confirmed
keyEvents.description: Caesar Clown's unconscious body is shown flying through the facility after his defeat by Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Straw Hats' main objective on Punk Hazard.

keyEvents.title: Baby 5 and Buffalo Arrive
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo's assassins arrive at Punk Hazard to investigate Caesar's status.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces new antagonists to the Punk Hazard conflict.
